overview: From 2025-10-22 to 2025-10-23, elizaos/docs had 2 new PRs (2 merged), 0 new issues, and 4 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Switch API Reference => REST Reference
topPRs.author: yungalgo
topPRs.body: Better naming convention for docs and dev understanding. As req by ticket ELIZA-714.

topPRs.title: feat: add launch resources page
topPRs.author: yungalgo
topPRs.body:
added all the resources from build.elizaos.ai (now deprecated) onto its own tab within docs so builders can access forms and info about builder stuff from within docs itself.

also removed an old page that was no longer being used (development)

completedItems.title: feat: add launch resources page
completedItems.body:

also removed an old page that was no longer being used (develo

completedItems.title: Switch API Reference => REST Reference
completedItems.body: Better naming convention for docs and dev understanding. As req by ticket ELIZA-714.

topContributors.summary: yungalgo: Focused on documentation improvements, merging two PRs in elizaos/docs (#76, #75) that added a launch resources page and updated API reference terminology, primarily contributing to other work and bug fixes across 183 files with a focus on documentation.

ChristopherTrimboli: Focused on significant refactoring, notably merging PR elizaos/eliza#6087 which involved a substantial removal of Claude-related code and upgrades, demonstrating a primary focus on other work and bug fixes across 64 modified files.

wtfsayo: Focused on refining type definitions, merging a PR in elizaos/eliza (#6085) that replaced `Agent.description` with `bio`, and also modified 53 files with a primary focus on other work, bug fixes, and tests.
tcm390: Focused on bugfix work, merging a PR in elizaos/eliza (#6084) that addressed an action thought, and also contributed to other work.
amlord: Focused on feature work, adding a new nuggets plugin in elizaos-plugins/registry via PR #236, which involved modifying 2 files with a primary focus on configuration.

linear: Focused on strategic planning and documentation improvements, creating six issues including "DevTools MCP Server" (elizaos/eliza#6092) and "Create Actual API/SDK Section of Docs" (elizaos/eliza#6090), while also closing two issues.
standujar: Focused on a mix of feature work and other tasks, contributing 3 commits that modified 44 files with a net change of +1242 lines of code, and also provided one approval review.
schmidsi: Focused on identifying and reporting a potential module resolution issue, creating issue elizaos/eliza#6088 which was subsequently closed.

borisudovicic: Focused on documentation and release process improvements, creating and closing multiple issues including "Learning Aids & Discovery" (elizaos/eliza#5940), "Developer Guides" (elizaos/eliza#5939), and "Release Automation" (elizaos/eliza#5937), while also opening an issue for "Left Menu Items" (elizaos/eliza#6086).
